# Deterioration in Your State of Health

If you were injured in a traffic accident and your state of health has deteriorated or worsened, you can ask the SAAQ to reassess your compensation.

- ## 1 What you should know

If you were injured in a traffic accident and your state of health has deteriorated or worsened, you can ask the SAAQ to reassess your compensation.

**Here are the eligibility conditions:**

- You previously suffered a period of disability because of your traffic accident and that period ended.
- You resumed your occupations, your work or the work we determined for you, but your state of health has deteriorated and you are once again unable to pursue your activities.

**You can apply for:**

- [income replacement](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/traffic-accident/public-automobile-insurance-plan/covered-how/financial-compensation/income-replacement)
- [care expenses](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/traffic-accident/public-automobile-insurance-plan/covered-how/financial-compensation/care-expenses)
- reimbursement of certain expenses

- ## 3 Consulting a physician

- ### Costs

We will refund you up to $93 for the cost of the detailed medical report issued by your physician. To demonstrate that your state of health has deteriorated, you must consult a physician of your choice.

The medical report issued by your physician must show the connection between your relapse and the traffic accident.

### Cost of the medical report

We will reimburse you up to $93 for the cost of the medical report.

**Finding a physician**

Unfortunately, the SAAQ cannot help you find a physician or get an appointment more quickly. If you do not have a physician, refer to the [list of network clinics in your area⁠ ⁠](http://www.sante.gouv.qc.ca/en/repertoire-ressources/).

### Call us

- Québec area: 418 646-9877
- Elsewhere in Québec: 1 800 463-6890
- Outside of Québec: 1 800 463-6898

### Send us a letter along with the detailed medical report

- **Online**
- [Document Submission service](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/online-services/citizens/reimbursement-expenses-document-submission)
- **By mail**
- Service aux accidentés

Société de l'assurance automobile du Québec

Case postale 19600, succursale Terminus

Québec (Québec) G1K 8J6
- **By fax**
- Québec area: 418 643-1654
- Elsewhere in Québec, toll-free: 1 866 289-7952

Remember to write your claim number on all documents you enclose with your application.

- ## 5 Processing the application and decision

- ### Costs

- We will refund you up to $93 for the cost of the detailed medical report issued by your physician.
- ### Documents to provide

- Detailed medical report or any other medical document

Once we have received your documents, your application will be analyzed and a written decision will be mailed to you.

If you disagree with the decision, call us for more information. If you are still unsatisfied, you have the right to [contest the decision](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/traffic-accident/contesting-decision).

- ## 6 In the event of a traffic accident

If you are the victim of a traffic accident, you must [report it](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/traffic-accident/event-of-an-accident) so that we can open a compensation file.
